informal_statement: Find $9^{-1} \pmod{100}$, as a residue modulo 100.  (Give an answer between 0 and 99, inclusive.) Show that it is 89.
formal_statement:
theorem mathd_numbertheory_34:
  fixes x::nat
  assumes "x < 100"
    and "x*9 mod 100 = 1" 
  shows "x = 89"
formal_code:
(*
  Authors: Wenda Li
*)

theory mathd_numbertheory_34 
  imports Complex_Main "HOL-Computational_Algebra.Computational_Algebra"
begin

theorem mathd_numbertheory_34:
  fixes x::nat
  assumes "x < 100"
    and "x*9 mod 100 = 1" 
  shows "x = 89"
  sorry

end
